All Ant models can and need to trigger the start of the decay code completion 
thread.

Only some Ant model creation was cancelling the execution of said thread :-)
so the thread was attempting to be started more than once when disposing these 
Ant models.

Fixed in AntModel so that all models cancel the thread on creation.
*** Bug 78660 has been marked as a duplicate of this bug. ***
*** Bug 79070 has been marked as a duplicate of this bug. ***
*** Bug 79528 has been marked as a duplicate of this bug. ***
